data.title: Brooks School in MA
data.meta_description: Explore reviews, rankings, SAT/ACT test scores, popular colleges, and statistics for Brooks School in MA.
data.text:
View Event Description

Meet and speak with faculty on campus during our annual Fall Visit Day for prospective students and their families. During this informal event for eighth, ninth and tenth graders, students and parents will hear from Brooks School's Acting Head of School Nina Freeman and can connect with faculty members. Teachers from our six academic departments — as well as the leaders of our special programs, including Exchange, Students on the Forefront and other initiatives — will be on hand to answer questions. We look forward to seeing you! Until then, if you would like to get in touch, feel free to email admission@brooksschool.org. For all admission information, visit https://www.brooksschool.org/admission/welcome.

View Event Description

We welcome you to learn about Diversity, Equity, Inclusion and Belonging (DEIB) in the Brooks community from Dean of DEIB Terri Ofori. All prospective students and their families are invited to join in this online event. If you have any questions about the gathering or Brooks admission, feel free to email admission@brooksschool.org and visit https://www.brooksschool.org/admission to learn more. We look forward to seeing you!

View Event Description

You're invited to "drop in" and talk with current Brooks School parents who will share their experiences and answer any questions you may have. All prospective students and their families are invited to join in this online event. We look forward to seeing you! Until then, if you would like to get in touch, feel free to email admission@brooksschool.org. For all admission information, visit https://www.brooksschool.org/admission.

View Event Description

Hear from student leaders and Director of Student Affairs Ingrid Knowles about what it's like to be a part of the Brooks School community. What do students do for fun? How does living on campus work, exactly? Outside of the classroom, what will my days and nights be like at Brooks? Get answers to questions like these and ask whatever you'd like. All prospective students and their families are invited to join in this online event. Until then, if you would like to get in touch, feel free to email admission@brooksschool.org. For all admission information, visit https://www.brooksschool.org/admission. We look forward to seeing you!
